name: Vector Wars (Lil Cage)
description:
Vector Wars Join our discord! Support my living on Patreon!

Protect Humanity from the onslaught of illegal clones with your troops!

This game was created in three (two actually, work sucks) days for the ScoreSpace game jam #16!

The theme was "Clones", but there was a voting period for two other themes and i was inspired also by the theme "Tower defense" and decided to make a Genre-Theme/Story mish-mash!
